arts.ttl: 'Absolutely furious': Portsmouth boss lifts lid on why he was fuming during victory over Cardiff
arts.sum: ‘Furious’ John Mousinho has revealed how he launched into his team at half-time against Cardiff - despite leading 2-1.

arts.ttl: Colby Bishop delivers big Portsmouth contract statement amid talk of new deal
arts.sum: Colby Bishop has made it clear he wants to stay at Pompey after hitting his landmark 50th goal for his club.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth reeling after latest set-back for luckless Conor Shaughnessy after Cardiff injury blow
arts.sum: Pompey are reeling after yet another injury blow to Conor Shaughnessy.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth 2-1 Cardiff City: Bluebirds shoot themselves in foot again as they pay price for dreadful start
arts.sum: The Bluebirds shot themselves in the foot again, conceding twice in the first 20 minutes away from home for the third successive match on the road courtesy of goals from Colby Bishop and Conor Shaughnessy. A lax pass from Cian Ashford gifted the ball to the home side and Josh Murphy, who terrorised City's defence found himself driving at Cardiff's back line before he fed Bishop, who took a touch and finished expertly from the edge of the box.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth 2 Cardiff 1: Neil Allen's verdict - Talisman's timely return to brilliance to inspire crucial triumph
arts.sum: With impeccable timing, Colby Bishop delivered yet another reminder why he is cherished by the Fratton faithful.

It was City who had the best of it as the half progressed with O'Dowda, Cian Ashford and Joel Bagan all going close to an equalising goal. Portsmouth did have a further chance to increase their advantage towards the end of the opening half following a defensive mix up, but Will Fish did brilliantly to block the incoming shot.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth beat Cardiff to move away from bottom three
arts.sum: Conor Shaughnessy claimed his first goal of the season as Portsmouth boosted their Sky Bet Championship survival hopes by leapfrogging fellow strugglers Cardiff in the table thanks to a 2-1 victory.

arts.ttl: ‘Relentless’, ‘man on a mission’, ‘tantalising quality’: Jordan Cross’ Portsmouth ratings from crucial Cardiff City victory
arts.sum: The ratings are in from Pompey’s clash with Cardiff City tonight.

arts.ttl: Conor Shaughnessy on target as Portsmouth boost survival hopes with Cardiff win
arts.sum: Colby Bishop poked Pompey into an early lead at Fratton Park before defender Shaughnessy headed home to double the advantage.

arts.ttl: Surprise Portsmouth absentee as John Mousinho makes once change for crucial Cardiff clash
arts.sum: Freddie Potts is a notable absentee from Pompey duty for their crucial clash with Cardiff.
